channel.title: thought on Alok's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in thought on Alok's Blog

item.title: The Unbearable Lightness of Being
item.description: – book_author: Milan Kundera – rating: 5/5 The way book talks of love: intricate yet tight interplay of human emotions, comparing them to politics every now and then is amazing. How people fail to realize all their lives of love: how they victimize each other with both of power and of weakness. People live on and share beds but share love with someone else. The jealousy between mistresses of Tomas: his breaking out of himself and his rules led the story here.

item.title: Raspberry Pi Project Ideas
item.description: Making projects with raspberry pi: Onion pi Code to automate flight timelapse : Pi cobbler for easy access to gpio pins web server with pi Arduino with pi : pyfirmata, pyserial Coding with scratch analysing loval network : Nagios Pi improve performance by boostraping pen drive instead of sd card to boot 9/. Making a battery pack for pi: UBEC : one with micro usb connector 3A 6S max 6A

item.title: Musical Thoughts
item.description: Don’t we feel a curiosity why music has played such an important part of our life? Even though we dont like a certain language, we love to hear the mere music without understanding what it’s talking about, isn’t it? I clearly listened to Shakira’s Chantaje without even searching for what it means or what it is talking about. Music has no clear origins from where it all started. Regarding to it’s origin there are basically two theories that are worth to be watched: Evolutionary basis or The Cultural Evolution
